title: Bloomberg Markets: Bradshaw Exercises Patience With GE
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bradshaw Exercises Patience With GE
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Gary Bradshaw Portfolio Manager Hodges Capital Discussing stocks in his Blue Chip Equity Income Fund, including General Electric and Facebook.
